item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. JD Vance urges billionaire Peter Thiel to help bankroll Trump campaign
2. Republicans worry Trump’s campaign strategy against Harris is failing
3. Nvidia valuation falls almost $200bn after earnings report
4. Ukraine’s Kursk invasion ‘devastating’ for Putin, says Sweden
5. Harris pitches for centre in first big TV interview as candidate
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
